attributes.action: BAN Detentions, BAN Homework unless necessary & BAN teachers neglecting students
attributes.additional_details: Students are tired and fed up with the current school rules and the ways they are treated at school BY the teachers. Students mental health are neglected every single day of them learning at school in some way and the schools aren’t listening to the students enough. Many students bunk lessons and sometimes the entire school day due to the way they are treated and how they feel at school. Most students don’t do anything in their lessons for the same reason. They want a change!!
attributes.background: We want the government to ban detentions, ban homework’s (exceptions to this) and ban teachers neglecting students Mental health!
